#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long long getn(){
	long long n=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c< '0'||c>'9')c= getchar_unlocked();
	while(c>='0'&& c<='9')
		n = (n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c= getchar_unlocked();
	return n;
}
int main()
{
 long long test,n;
 long long sum_even,sum_odd,sum;
 test=getn();
 while(test--)
 {
     n=getn();
//if no of terms is odd then::sum odd=sum even
     if(n&1)
     {
         n=n/2;
         sum=n*(n+1);
     }
//in case no of terms is even then ::sum odd=sum even-n/2;
     else
     {
         n/=2;
         sum=n*(n+1)-n;
     }
     printf("%lld\n",sum);
 }
}
